Text: Osho was formerly known as Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh and his teachings led members of his cult to poison over 700 people in The Dalles, OR in 1984. He changed his name after he was deported from the U.S., but his 'teachings' are the same - dangerous and insane.

heynonny thanks for the info on criminal past of osho's followers. i dont know enough about him. this is a indian classical vocal performance at the Osho ashram and has nothing to do with his teachings as such except for the mood of meditation evocated in the music.
